name: dedth3h
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5, wff w6
body: -| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w3, w4))
-| wi(wceq(c2, cif(c2, c3, w1)), wb(w4, w5))
-| wi(wceq(c4, cif(c4, c5, w2)), wb(w5, w6))

stmt.origin: dedth(c0, c1, w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), w3), wi(wa(w1, w2), w4))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), w3))

-| wi(wa(w1, w2), w4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), w3)
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(wi(wa(w1, w2), w3), wi(wa(w1, w2), w4)))
-| wi(wa(w1, w2), w4)

stmt.origin: imbi2d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wa(w1, w2), w3, w4)
stmt.pretty: imbi2d(c0 = if(w0, c0, c1), (w1 ∧ w2), w3, w4)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(wi(wa(w1, w2), w3), wi(wa(w1, w2), w4)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w3, w4))

cumulated.origin:

-| wi(wa(w1, w2), w4)
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w3, w4))

stmt.origin: dedth2h(c2, c3, c4, c5, w1, w2, w4, w5, w6)

body.origin:

-| wi(wceq(c4, cif(c4, c5, w2)), wb(w5, w6))

comment: Weak deduction theorem eliminating three hypotheses. See comments in ~ dedth2h . (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1999.)
